description: This file defines a custom exception class StorageProviderException used for signaling storage provider errors within the application.

classes.name: StorageProviderException
classes.description: A custom runtime exception used to indicate errors related to storage provider operations.

methods.name: StorageProviderException(String message)
methods.description: Constructor that creates a new exception with a specified error message.

methods.name: StorageProviderException(String message, Throwable cause)
methods.description: Constructor that creates a new exception with a specified error message and root cause.
